content.description: Shared start with Crysta on jug in the seam, either hike up a high left foot and reach or dyno from the start into the ledge up and left, easy topout.
content.location: Hexxus is located on the holds just left to the start of Crysta.  Make your choice to either go up through the crimps or dyno to the ledge and topout slightly to the left.

content.description: Start as for Crysta and Hexus, trend right along the seam, but before it angles up and to the right, as for Crysta, hike up a left foot to the start holds and make a big reach up with the left hand to a good edge directly under the jug Crysta uses for it's top-out, from the jug top-out straight up.
content.location: Shared start with Crysta and Hexus on the left side of the wall.

content.description: A nice smooth easier problem traversing through a rail and up through some nice holds into a topout.
content.location: Starts toward the left side of the rail located around the middle of the wall face.  Traverses right then switches back up slightly left into a topout just left of the tree up top.

content.description: A wall face slightly hidden back into the trees around several ferns (surprise surprise). Has a couple fun easier problems to hop on.
